mapper.select: select CREATECODE, to_char(CREATEDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') CREATEDATE, CCODE, CID, CTYPE, CINSTITUTION, CINTRODUCTION, CGOAL, CLIST, CINSTRUCTOR, CINSTINTRO, CEVALUATION, CBOOK from createclass where createcode = #{createcode:INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into createclass(CREATECODE, CREATEDATE, CCODE, CID,CTYPE, CINSTITUTION,CINTRODUCTION, CGOAL, CLIST, CINSTRUCTOR, CINSTINTRO, CEVALUATION, CBOOK) values(CREATECLASS_CREATECODE_SEQ.nextval, #{createdate:VARCHAR}, #{ccode:INTEGER}, #{cid:VARCHAR}, #{ctype:VARCHAR}, #{cinstitution:VARCHAR}, #{cintroduction:VARCHAR}, #{cgoal:VARCHAR}, #{clist:VARCHAR}, #{cinstructor:VARCHAR}, #{cinstintro:VARCHAR}, #{cevaluation:VARCHAR}, #{cbook:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update createclass set CREATECODE=#{createcode:INTEGER}, CREATEDATE=#{createdate:VARCHAR}, CCODE=#{ccode:INTEGER}, CID=#{cid:VARCHAR}, CTYPE=#{ctype:VARCHAR}, CINSTITUTION=#{cinstitution:VARCHAR}, CINTRODUCTION=#{cintroduction:VARCHAR}, CGOAL=#{cgoal:VARCHAR}, CLIST=#{clist:VARCHAR}, CINSTRUCTOR=#{cinstructor:VARCHAR}, CINSTINTRO=#{cinstintro:VARCHAR}, CEVALUATION=#{cevaluation:VARCHAR}, CBOOK=#{cbook:VARCHAR} where CREATECODE = #{createcode:INTEGER}
